HERO.TITLE: About Me
HERO.SUBTITLE: Hi there, my name is Marta Tendero
INTRO: I am a passionate visual storyteller specializing in

SECTIONS.HEADING: Drawing since I can remember
TEXT: This early impulse gradually evolved into my way of seeing and describing the world: through the vibrant lenses of art, thoughtful design, and engaging animation.
I honed my skills by complementing my Fine Arts background with a specialization in animation and Motion Graphics. Today, I thrive as a freelance illustrator, designer, and animator.
I'm drawn to visuals that resonate, aesthetics that communicate with clarity, and to images that weave compelling stories.

SECTIONS.HEADING: I illustrate, animate, and design
TEXT: Sometimes I'm bringing static images to life, other times I'm crafting visual narratives through animation, and often I'm solving communication challenges with thoughtful design. What truly matters to me is that the final result is intentional, meticulously crafted, and conveys something authentic.

My process blends the tactile with the digital. I seamlessly integrate manual techniques with cutting-edge tools like After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop, and Firefly to create animated or illustrated pieces that genuinely connect with your audience.
I enjoy working across diverse projects, from the cultural to the commercial: think striking book covers, engaging social media videos, and impactful graphic campaigns.

SECTIONS.HEADING: Bridging the classic and the digital
TEXT: A line that breathes with life, a rhythm that stirs emotion, a color that sparks a memoryâ€¦ I find joy in working from the subtle nuances, the intricate details.
I adapt my approach by using both traditional and digital techniques, tailoring them to each unique project, collaborative team, or core message.

Every commission is an exciting opportunity for me to build visually polished and emotionally resonant images that tell a story. If you have a narrative to share, I'm passionate about finding the perfect visual language to bring it to life.

SECTIONS.HEADING: Visual solutions for diverse needs
TEXT: I can help you shape a compelling video, illustrate a powerful idea, design a cohesive campaign, or discover the visual style that unifies your brand communication.
My approach harmoniously blends conceptual clarity with meticulous visual detail.
You can count on me for punctual delivery, a meticulous approach to the process, and a proactive contribution of ideas, not just execution.
I approach every project with seriousness, yet with a light touch: committed, but without the drama.

SECTIONS.HEADING: Ready to bring your vision to life?
TEXT: If you're looking for a captivating animation, a series of impactful illustrations, or a meticulously designed and thoughtfully conceived graphic proposal, I'd love to hear from you.
I'm eager to listen to your idea, help you shape it visually, and explore the best way for us to collaborate.
